original_text: And I will put my Spirit within you, and cause you to walk in my statutes and be careful to obey my rules.
korean_text: 또 내 영을 너희 속에 두어 너희로 내 율례를 행하게 하리니 너희가 내 규례를 지켜 행할지라

sentences.original_text: And I will put my Spirit within you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 내 영을 너희 안에 두리라

sentences.original_text: and cause you to walk in my statutes
and be careful to obey my rules.
